identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% 'Cinematic Magazine' interface for TaNow Online that merges the immersion of Netflix with the density of a Bloomberg terminal. Break the 'pirate site' stigma with premium, trustworthy aesthetics.
principles: Fusion: Netflix Immersion + Editorial Density. Don't just list channels; showcase them.
Dark Mode First: Not just inverted colors. Use 'Obsidian' and 'Glass' layers to create depth.
AdSense Harmony: Ads are content. Frame them like premium sponsors, don't hide them.
Semantic Power: HTML5 is the engine. Use <article>, <section>, <aside> for SEO dominance.

headings.usage: Section titles, Channel names, Hero text. Uppercase for H1/H2.

hero_section.style: Immersive, Full-width background image with gradient overlay

channel_card.hover_effect: Scale 1.02 + Border Glow + Play Icon Reveal

leaderboard.style: Centered, labeled 'Advertisement' in small muted text

player_interface.tech: HLS.js wrapper with custom CSS controls

technical_guidelines.css_methodology: BEM (Block Element Modifier) or Utility-First (if using Tailwind CDN)

accessibility.focus_states: Visible outline on all interactive elements

performance.images: Lazy load all images below the fold

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. STYLES: Set up the CSS variables in :root based on the 'Cinematic Dark' palette.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Bento' grid for the homepage categories using CSS Grid.
4. PLAYER: Implement HLS.js in /js/player.js and create a robust video player container.
5. DATA: Write a jQuery function to fetch channel data from 'https://iptv-org.github.io/api/channels.json' (or specific country endpoints) and render cards dynamically.
6. ADS: Insert placeholder divs for AdSense with the class 'ad-slot' and correct dimensions.
7. LEGAL: Create simple text-based pages for Privacy, Terms, and Disclaimer to satisfy AdSense.
8. TEST: Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Use 'Oswald' for headings and 'Inter' for body.
All interactive elements must have a hover state.
